channel.title: CodeUSA RSPS - Simply The Best
channel.description:
[center]Not sure why my thread was deleted, but here I go again.
[img]http://codeusa.net/poster.jpg[/img] [img]http://codeusa.net/banners/square.gif[/img] [img]http://codeusa.net/banners/100600.gif[/img] [img]http://codeusa.net/banners/large.gif[/img]
Register your account: [url=http://codeusa.net/forums/register.php]http://codeusa.net/forums/register.php[/url]
Download our desktop client: [url=http://codeusa.net/download/]http://codeusa.net/download/[/url]
Play online: [url=http://codeusa.net/play/]http://codeusa.net/play/[/url] Be sure to login with your forum username and password. Case sensitive![/center]

item.title: CodeUSA RSPS - Simply The Best
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Please stop reposting your comment in order to bump this thread - if it happens again this thread will be locked and you will not be allowed to post another advertisement for this server.
Thanks, and good luck.

I actually love what you have done with this, and I assume its still 667 correct ?

gl with this.

It was never 667, but thank you.

http://codeusa.net/forums/game-general-discussion/7247-changelog-post30700.html#post30700

Latest update is posted
[/quote]

I just assumed cause when I look at the pics I see some 667 content[/quote]
I have a lot of content from higher revisions. The wonders of client editing.

http://codeusa.net/forums/forum-updates/7253-forum-updates-post30740.html#post30740
Forums updated

http://codeusa.net/forums/community-voting/7266-what-do-you-want-us-live-stream-our-first-staff-event-post30737.html#post30737

item.title: CodeUSA RSPS - Simply The Best
item.dc:creator: @Codeusa11 Codeusa11
item.description:
@Codeusa11 wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:4, topic:525195”][quote author=Codeusa11 link=topic=643886.msg4333730#msg4333730 date=1374020658]

You should be banned from this section.

Makes sense, advertise an original and creative server & I deserve a ban for it.
[/quote]

I’m just jelly on the amount of threads there are for this 1 server when the rules clearly state that only one thread should be made per server. I might as well get a couple of my players to dominate this section if the admins are fine with it which it seems.[/quote]
Red Dead was a player, CodeusaStaff was a moderator who no longer actually plays and I am the owner and this is my actual account. Threads that were buried back dozens of pages weren’t causing any hindrances and I would have happily let a mod delete those. Plus, each one is different. The server actually progressively updates so the threads are dated.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,558318.0.html - Nothing here is even current
The other thread - January 10, 2013, 08:54:02 AM
Regardless it isn’t under my control, I can’t help that staff and players took it upon themselves to create threads where I had not. Not being so childish.

Read full topic
